sqlMap.select: SELECT A.school_cl_cd AS cl_cd , B.sub_nm AS cl_nm , A.teacher_cd AS div_cd , C.nm AS div_nm FROM tb_teacher A JOIN tb_school B ON A.school_cd = B.cd AND A.class_cd = B.sub_cd LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_common C ON A.teacher_cd = C.cd WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.id = #id# AND A.school_cd = #school_cd# AND A.us_yn = 'Y'
